title: Where in The World
description: View information about countries using data from the REST Countries API. You can search for countries or filter by region. Click on a country to see more detailed information on a seperate page where you can also click through to border countries. You can also toggle the theme between dark and light mode.

title: Bookmark Landing Page
description: This landing page for Bookmark (A simple bookmark manager)  was built using SASS, flexbox, css grid, and JavaScript using a mobile first approach.

title: Pomodoro Timer
description: The pomodoro technique is a time management method that uses a timer to break down work into intervals, traditionally 25 minutes of work separated by short breaks. With this pomodor timer you can set custom focused work and break time.

title: Markdown Previewer
description: Markdown is a lightweight markup language with plain text formatting syntax. Markdown is often used to format readme files, for writing messages in online discussion forums, and to create rich text using a plain text editor.

title: Clipboard Landing Page
description: Clipboard allows you to track and organize everything you copy. Instantly access your clipboard on all your devices.

title: Weather App
description: With this weather app you can lookup weather information. The Apixu API is used to pull in the weather data.
